Item.Value: \f[1|Salamede]\s[1]I HAVE TO BUY THEM! I WON'T LET ANYTHING STOP ME!!|
\f[1|Dealer]\s[1]You're not one of the regulars.\w[10] Heh,\w[5] what a fool you are.\w[10] Wandering all the way out here.| Guess I'll get even more loot today.|
\f[1|Emil]\s[1]You're trespassing.| This will be my warning shot.\w[10] If you don't leave,\w[5] you'll be leaving the other way.|
\f[1|Sketchy Guy]\s[1]Wait a minute there!\w[15] I come in peace!!|\scrollSeriously!|
\f[1|Dealer]\f[6|Marc]\e[6|2]\s[6]Just give them up!|\s[1]...\w[15]What?|\s[6]You know what!|\s[1]......?|
\f[1|Salamede]\s[1]I HAVE TO--\wait[15]\scrollWhoa, you look like a grape.|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]What?|
\f[1|Salamede]\s[1]You're not one of the regulars.\w[10] You look like a grape.|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]...\w[15]Wait,\w[5] what?|
\f[1|Emil]\s[1]...\w[15]You there.|Why do you look so much like a grape?|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]Excuse me???|

\f[1|Salamede]\s[1]What the--\wait[15]\scrollDammit,\w[5] it's you!|\f[6|Vandal]\s[6]Oy,\w[5] what's with that look?\w[15] Not happy to see a familiar face?|\s[1]Not of a thief who would try to steal from our commander.\w[10] Get out of here,\w[5] you crook!|\s[6]Sheesh,\w[5] talk about calling the kettle black.|\scrollDon't worry,\w[5] I'll be out of your face real soon...\w[15] along with a few souvenirs,\w[5] of course.|
\f[1|Torlo]\s[1]A challenge, for me, Marc?|\scrollWell, I, being Marc, dealt with worse, bring it on, fucker.|
\f[1|Valtheus]\s[1]...|

\f[1|Torlo]\f[6|Ephraim]\e[6|2]\s[1]Friend!|\s[6]Huh?|\s[1]It's such a joy to see you,\w[5] old buddy of mine!\w[15] Might we partake in a friendly chat?| How have you been?\w[15] I,\w[5] being Marc...\wait[20] am feelin--\wait[15]\s[6]Hey,\w[5] hold on just a second.\w[10] You look nothing like...|\scroll\e[6|3]Uh,\w[5] well,\w[5] you aren't Marc,\w[5] are you?| You're just another lookalike...\w[20]right?|\s[1]You wound me,\w[5] my friend.| We are all Marc!| As Marc is I and I am him!| You're a friend...\w[20]for all\e[6|2] of us.|\s[6]Uh,\w[5] I'll pass,\w[5] thank you.\w[10] \e[6|3]This is giving me a headache...|

\f[1|Valtheus]\f[6|Ciraxis]\s[6]...|\s[1]...|\s[6]...|\s[1]...|\s[-2]\f[1|nil]\f[6|nil]\wait[5]\s[-2]\f[1|Purt]\f[2|Avraxas]\f[5|Ash]\f[6|Char]\s[5]....\w[15]Is that really it?\w[15] I thought they'd both say something cool.| I was expecting, you know, some epic dramatics or something...|\s[1]Really?\w[15] He doesn't seem the type for that.|\s[2]But,\w[5] he's right,\w[5] you know.\w[10] Would have been pretty cool.|\s[5]Yeah,\w[5] yeah!\w[15] Like,\w[5] Ciraxis could've come in and stared him down:|\scroll"I'm the bigger one here,\w[5] wretched fool.\w[10] You've no place in my sight!!!"|\s[2]"You think I would fear feeble toys such as that?\w[15] Bah,\w[5] pathetic."|\s[5]"Heh.\w[10] I see your failure in understanding just who it is you're facing,\w[5] welp!!"|\s[1]"Ash,\w[5] take care\e[5|2] of him?"|\s[5]...\w[15]Oh,\w[5] shit. You're right, there. Goddamnit all...|\s[6]...ok|
\f[1|Valtheus]\f[6|Ciraxis]\s[6]...|\s[1]...|\s[6]You look familiar.|\s[1]...|\s[6]...\w[15]Yeah,\w[5] I don't really care,\w[5] either.\w[10] Let's get this over with.|
\f[1|Torlo]\s[1]You look like a grape.|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]Why??|
\f[1|Valtheus]\s[1]...|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]...\w[15]You think I look like a grape,\w[5] too,\w[5] don't you.|
\f[1|SnarkyFoe]\s[1]This has nothing to do with you,\w[5] be a good lad and run along now.|
\f[1|GrimaJoe]\e[1|1]\s[1]Your end is near.|
\f[1|Mark]\s[1]\e[1|1]Hahaha!\w[15] You think you can defeat ME?|\scroll\e[1|1]I'll wipe the floor with you.|
\f[1|David]\s[1]Not many realize the fabled Deathawks truly did exist.|\scrollCome,\w[5] I challenge you to but try to remove it from my grasp!|
\f[1|SnarkyFoe]\f[6|Marc]\e[6|2]\s[1]*I* may not have recovered all my power from last time,| but *I* have more than enough to have my revenge.|\s[6]Not today,\w[5] motherfucker.|

\f[1|SnarkyFoe]\f[6|Ash]\s[1]Another fool who wishes to fight me?|\s[6]Oh,\w[5] it's you. You're that SnarkyJoe guy,\w[5] right?|\s[1]\e[1|1]SnarkyFoe.|\scrollWell, this is growing irritating.|\s[6]Sure,\w[5] whatever.|\scrollAnyways,\w[5] \e[1|0]I've heard that you can duplicate yourself,\w[5] like me.| I'd like to ask you a little bit about that.|\s[1]And why\e[6|2] would I disclose my abilities to you?|\s[6]Uh...\w[15]I guess you don't have any reason to...| \e[6|0]I would certainly appreciate it,\w[5] though.|\s[1]Very funny.| Even if I were to tell you...\w[15] You wouldn't live to make any use of it!|\s[6]So you won't tell...\wait[20] Meh,\w[5] okay.| Well,\w[5] maybe I can still salvage something...\w[15] \e[6|3]You know,\w[5] after dealing with you.|\s[1]We'll see about that.|

\f[6|RS]\f[1|SnarkyFoe]\s[6]Target located. Preparing for frontal assault.|\s[1]Oh? Am I seeing things? You would face against me directly?|\s[6]...|\s[1]How foolish.|\scroll\e[1|1]Why,\w[5] were I not relying on borrowed power... \e[1|0]My magic would overwhelm you in but a second!|\s[6]Your words fall on deaf ears.|\scrollIn fact,\w[5] since you're weaker,\w[5] as you just said...\w[15] I've no reason to care for your scare tactics.|\s[1]Such brave words coming from such little power. Maybe it won't be a second,\w[5] but a minute will suffice!|\s[6]...|\scrollEngaging in combat.|
\f[1|GlitchyJoe]\f[6|Ash]\s[6]What is...\w[15] \e[6|2]What are you doing here?|\w[15]\s[1]......\w[15]A.......|\s[6]........|

\f[1|Mark]\f[6|Purt]\e[6|3]\s[6]It was you,\w[5] wasn't it.|\s[1]\e[1|1]Yeah,\w[5] that's right.|\s[6]...\w[15]Well,\w[5] since you're here now.\w[10] Let's chat.|\s[1]Chat?|\s[6]Yeah.\w[10] Chat.|\s[1]\m[1|1]Hahahaha!|\scrollYou're upset,\w[5] aren't you?|\s[6]\e[6|2]Of course I am.|\scrollYou fucked over not only me,\w[5] but also one of my friends.| We thought he tried to kill us over mere pocket change.| For the longest time,\w[5] I even held it against him.| Who knows what else you might have done during your little masquerade.|\s[1]Pfft.\w[10] You're worried over him?\w[15] You're so pathetic.|\s[6]\e[6|3]Pathetic?\w[15] What for?\w[15] Being human?\w[15] He's a good friend of mine now.|\scrollYou're a real fucking piece of work,\w[5] you know that?|

\f[1|Mark]\f[6|Marc]\s[1]Marc.\w[10] I fear you've made a grave mistake facing me.|\s[6]Listen,\w[5] buddy.\w[10] I have nothing to say to you.\w[10]| So don't bother and just give up.|\s[1]Hmph.\w[10]|\scrollFine then,\w[5] be a little prick.\w[10] You'll regret being so disrespectful.|

\f[1|Mark]\f[6|Ephraim]\e[6|2]\s[6]Well,\w[5] you're pretty tough,\w[5] I'll give you that.| It's hard to get a solid hit with so much bulk.|\s[1]So you aknowledge your inferiority?| You can do nothing against us!\w[15] You might as well give up now.|\s[6]Hey now,\w[5] I didn't say that.| \e[6|2]You're bulky,\w[5] but that doesn't mean invincible\e[1|1]. \e[6|0]And you're about to learn that the hard way!|\s[1]Meaningless words... I'll just have to show how you how weak you are!|

\f[1|David]\f[6|Wolfram]\s[1]...\w[15]Who is this guy?|\s[6]....\w[15]Huh?|\scrollAre you talking to me?|\s[1]Yeah.\w[10] You're giving off a different vibe from the others.|\s[6]\e[6|2]......|\s[1]......|

\f[1|David]\f[6|Ash]\s[6]Hmm....\w[15]|\scrollYou know,\w[5] despite being evil,\w[5] that is one hell of a stache.|\s[1].....?\w[15]|\scrollOh,\w[5] thank you.\w[10] I take great pride in how well I maintain it.|\s[6]Got any tips?\w[15] I'm not sure about growing one out,\w[5] but I've really been thinking about it.|\s[1]Sure.| First,\w[5] you shoul--\wait[15]\scrollOh.\w[10] Wait a minute.\w[10] You're just trying to distract me!|\s[6]Whaaat?|\scrollNah,\w[5] I'm being totally serious here!|\s[1]I won't fall for it!|\s[6]\e[6|2]Ugh… seriously?\w[15] This is annoying.|\scrollAll I wanted was some tips.| You have no idea how hard it is to find a mug with facial hair to ask.|
\f[1|SnarkyFoe]\s[1]This has nothing to do with you,\w[5] be a good...\w[15] ...|\scroll...\w[15]Grape?|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]STOP IT!!|
\f[1|GrimaJoe]\e[1|1]\s[1]What?\w[15] Why do you look like grape?|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]NOO!!!|
\f[1|Mark]\s[1]What the fuck...?\w[15] You look like a grape.|\s[6]WHAT'S WITH THIS?!\w[15] I'M NOT A GRAPE!!|
\f[1|David]\s[1]Is that a--\wait[15]\s[6]NO! I'M NOT A FUCKING GRAPE YOU PIECE OF SHIT!|\s[1]What the hell... Hey, calm down a little.|\s[6]Why me...|
\f[2|GrimaJoe_2]\s[-1]おうて おふ てへえ わあよ, ふええびれえ ぎあるびあぎえ! てへいす いす びえてわええぬ むえ あぬで い！|

\f[6|Ciraxis]\f[2|GrimaJoe_2]\s[6]Y'know,\w[5] nobody would have minded if you just stayed quiet somewhere and never showed up again.|\scrollPeople probably don't even remember you at all from Ragefest 4.|\s[-1]びあしけ てへえぬ い わあす すうぴぴおすえで てお てあけえ おひえる むあるし'す れいふえ あぬで びえしおむえ しおむぴれえてえ.| い'ひえ びええぬ わあいていぬぎ すお Lおぬぎ てお ふいぬあれれよ ふうれふいれれ むよ ぴうるぴおすえ.| わへよ あるえ よおう ぎえててIぬぎ いぬ むよ わあよ?|\s[6]Your purpose was to be a throwaway final boss enemy for Marc to overcome during Title Here.| You're just another failed experiment of mine that didn't work out like I wanted.\w[10] All that's left for you is to disappear.|

\f[2|GrimaJoe_2]\f[6|Marc]\s[-1]すおおぬ むあるし!\w[15] よおう'れれ びえ ぎおぬえ,\w[5] あぬで い'れれ びえ てへえ おぬえ てるうえ むあるけよじおえ！|\scrollいて'す あれれ い'ひえ えひえる わあぬてえで すいぬしえ びえいぬぎ しるえあてえで すお れおぬぎ あぎお！|\s[6]Dude,\w[5] you need to like,\w[5] get over me.\w[10] Maybe get a hobby or something.|\s[-1]じうすて でいえ すお い しあぬ びえ てへえ おぬえ わいてへ てへえ よおうてうびえ しへあぬぬえれ,\w[5] あぬで てへえ でいすしおるで,\w[5] あぬで てへえ あぬぬおよいぬぎ ふあぬす！|\scrollいて'す すうぴぴおすえで てお びえ あれれ むいいいいいいいいいいいいいいぬえ！|

\f[6|Ash]\f[2|GrimaJoe_2]\s[6]I didn't know you could turn into a dragon like this.|\scrollReally,\w[5] by this point,\w[5] why not just try and forget about Marc?| You want to rule the world?\w[15] Just leave now and I'm pretty sure you could.|\s[-1]ぬお,\w[5] よおう ふあいれ てお うぬでえるすてあぬで!\w[15] い しあぬぬおて ふおるぎえて わへあて いす てるうれよ むいぬえ！|\scrollむあるし むうSて でいいいいいいいいいええええええ！！！|
\f[2|GrimaJoe_2]\s[-1]い わいれれ でえひおうる よおう , ぎるあぴえ!|\f[6|Bill]\s[6]You know what? Fuck my life.|
